desc: Yorkey Investigations is a Boutique Private Investigation Agency that has been in business for 15+ years servicing small business, corporate clients, high profile individuals, and general population. We specialize in Missing Persons, Records Reconciliation, Genealogical & Historical Research, Legal Support, & Estates.

layout.text: Yorkey Investigations is a Boutique Private Investigation Agency that has been in business for 15+ years servicing small business, corporate clients, high profile individuals, and general population alike. Yorkey Investigations is led by Chris Porter, whom most recently was granted status of Senior Investigator by the Council of Professional Investigators Ontario (CPIO). We specialize in Finding Birth Mothers, Missing Persons, Records Reconciliation, Genealogical & Historical Research. Our specializations in research have assisted hundreds of clients during our tenure and we have proudly reconnected families to over one hundred missing persons & adoption related cases.
